title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 800.21 - Safety measure against disease
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 800.21 - Safety measure against disease

State Regulations

Masters of all vessels are required to place guards or other
effective appliances on all hausers and lines, attached to the dock, to prevent
rats from moving between ship and dock. Likewise, gang-ways or other
connections between the boat and dock, when not in use, must be similarly
protected. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
800.21

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
